bibl.title: Riding Costume in Egypt. Origin and Appearance.

series.title: Studies in Textile and Costume History.

bibl.note: tabl. et 107 figg. n./bl., 43 figg. coul.
Workshop "Textiles from the Nile Valley" as part of the 7th International Congress for Coptic Studies in Leiden, September 2000. - 16 Communications.
bibl.seg: FLUCK Cäcilia and Gillian VOGELSANG-EASTWOOD (Edd.), Riding Costume in Egypt. Origin and Appearance. (Studies in Textile and Costume History. 3.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2004, 8°, xii-279 pp. tabl. et 107 figg. n./bl., 43 figg. coul. ISBN 90-04-13163-9. €99.
Workshop "Textiles from the Nile Valley" as part of the 7th International Congress for Coptic Studies in Leiden, September 2000. - 16 Communications.
C.R. par Marie-Hélène Rutschowskaya, BibO 63 (2006) coll. 99-102.
